question:
Work is being done on the street where you live. The noise is disturbing you. Write a letter of complaint to your local council. In your letter:
Introduce yourself
Explain what the problems is
Suggest solutions to the problem
text: The reason for writing this letter is the ongoing construction work at the junction of the main street for this I need to draw your attention.

Firstly, I have to give some details about myself, I am a resident of this society, and at the same term, I am an active member of the community union council which is the Union Council Welfare Association.

Secondly, I would like to address the issue because of this even though it can be beneficial in the long run, the workers create havoc on the roads. Due to this ,work too much noise arises as it disturbing badly to the families. Our area is extremely quiet and pleasant as our residents are not used to the level of noise. Sometimes, workers are going beyond their permissible hours particularly during the night hours so it spoils the rest hour.
Finally, I would recommend some suggestions as we have set some rules and regulations for our apartments so from next occasion it must be bound to certain week limits on a legally documented paper.
I am looking forward to hearing from your side.
